subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: Stephen Kiprotich’s victory in the marathon gave Uganda its first gold medal at the London Games and its second ever. Abel Kirui of Kenya won silver and his countryman Wilson Kipsang took bronze.
snippet: Stephen Kiprotich’s victory in the marathon gave Uganda its first gold medal at the London Games and its second ever. Abel Kirui of Kenya won silver and his countryman Wilson Kipsang took bronze.
